title: Love is Like a Cat
overview: When global superstar Piuno is threatened by those who wish to see him brought low, there's only one thing he can do to save his reputation and his career: work at a pet daycare. Pushing aside his severed dislike for animals, Piuno begins working alongside the daycare's director, Daebyeol, who helps him find ways to overcome the trauma that first inspired his hatred of animals. As his heart begins to soften, unexpected feelings for Daebyeol begin to arise. Could their current working relationship grow into something more?
